recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
recipes.description: Classic Italian pasta dish with a rich meat sauce.
recipes.instructions: Cook spaghetti; brown beef, onions, and garlic; add tomato sauce and herbs; combine with spaghetti.

recipes.title: Chicken Caesar Salad
recipes.description: Refreshing salad with grilled chicken and Caesar dressing.
recipes.instructions: Combine lettuce, grilled chicken, croutons, and Parmesan cheese; toss with Caesar dressing.

recipes.title: Vegetarian Stir-Fry
recipes.description: Healthy and colorful stir-fry with a variety of vegetables.
recipes.instructions: Stir-fry vegetables and tofu in a pan with soy sauce, ginger, and garlic until cooked.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients, drop spoonfuls onto a baking sheet, and bake until golden brown.

recipes.title: Mango Salsa
recipes.description: Refreshing salsa with fresh mango, tomatoes, and cilantro.
recipes.instructions: Dice ingredients, mix together, and squeeze lime juice over the top.

recipes.title: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
recipes.description: Classic comfort food with melted cheese between toasted bread slices.
recipes.instructions: Spread butter on bread, add cheese, and grill until the bread is golden and the cheese is melted.

recipes.title: Caprese Salad
recipes.description: Simple salad with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
recipes.instructions: Slice tomatoes and mozzarella, arrange with fresh basil, drizzle with balsamic glaze and olive oil, and sprinkle with salt.

recipes.title: Chicken Noodle Soup
recipes.description: Comforting soup with chicken, noodles, and vegetables.
recipes.instructions: Combine ingredients and simmer until vegetables are tender and noodles are cooked.

recipes.title: Pancakes
recipes.description: Fluffy pancakes for a delicious breakfast.
recipes.instructions: Mix ingredients, pour batter onto a griddle, and cook until bubbles form on the surface.

recipes.title: Greek Salad
recipes.description: Refreshing salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese.
recipes.instructions: Dice ingredients, toss together with olive oil and oregano, and top with feta cheese.
